name: Hoops (itch) (Deliriny2020)
description:
Hey everyone!! I'm back! 

I've been trying out some different game ideas, and this one was specifically appealing to me. 

It's basketball, but you have to launch yourself into baskets in low gravity. 

Also, there's portals, bounce pads, and obstacles.

This is just a demo to see how much ya'll like it, so let me know!

HAVE A GREAT DAY!!! 

-Deliriny2020
